attributes.action: Declare one day of the year to be ZOMBIE DAY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Celebrated on October 10th, we honor our nations soon-to-be-coming zombie attack, and watch our favorite zombie movies with pride. In which case everyone must remember that shooting or hitting zombies in the head is the only thing to stop them during an attack

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
